title: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - Down Alternative Microfiber Filled for Back, Stomach, Side Sleepers, Breathable, and Skin-Friendly
descriptions:
Product Listing:

Title: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping (Set of 2)

Description: 

The COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping are designed to provide you with a comfortable and cool sleeping experience. Each set includes 2 pillows, perfect for a queen-sized bed.

These pillows are made with high-quality materials to ensure durability and comfort. The fill material is a plush hollow fiber, which offers a soft and fluffy feel. The cover material is a polyester blend, providing a smooth and luxurious touch.

Suitable for all sleeping positions, these pillows are perfect for back sleepers, stomach sleepers, and side sleepers. The pillows are designed with no-shift construction, ensuring that the filling stays in place throughout the night.

The COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows are packed with features to enhance your sleep. They are breathable and skin-friendly, allowing air to circulate and keeping you cool and comfortable. The pillows are also machine washable and tumble dryable, making them easy to clean and maintain. 

For best results, it is recommended to wash the pillows at a temperature of 30°C and tumble dry them on a low setting. These pillows are vacuum-packed for easy shipping and storage. Please allow 24 hours for the pillows to fully expand before use.

Invest in the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping and enjoy a restful and rejuvenating sleep every night.

Introducing the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping. This set includes 2 pillows, perfect for a comfortable and restful night's sleep.

These pillows are made with high-quality down alternative microfiber material, providing a plush and luxurious feel. The filling is made of plush hollow fiber, offering excellent support and comfort.

Designed for all types of sleepers, including back sleepers, stomach sleepers, and side sleepers, these pillows are suitable for everyone. The pillows feature a no-shift construction, ensuring that the filling stays in place throughout the night.

One of the key features of these pillows is their breathability. They are made with breathable materials, allowing air to circulate and keeping you cool throughout the night. The skin-friendly design ensures that you wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

Cleaning these pillows is a breeze, as they are machine washable. Simply wash them at a temperature of 30°C and tumble dry on low setting. The pillows are also vacuum-packed, making them easy to store and transport.

The cover material of these pillows is a polyester blend, providing durability and softness. The recommended wait time before use is 24 hours to allow the pillows to fully expand and regain their shape.

These pillows are also breathable and skin-friendly, ensuring a hygienic and healthy sleep environment. The no-shift construction prevents the fill from clumping or shifting, maintaining the pillow's shape and support.
